mt:Texts.mt:Texts: Welcome to the MRET (Mixed Reality Exploration Toolkit) Tutorial!
In this section, we will be going over the different modes of Locomotion you can choose from. They include teleporting, flying, and walking!
First, we will go over teleporting. You can do this by aiming your controller at where you wish to go, and pressing the trigger button.
If your teleport line is green, that means you can teleport to that position. If it is red, you cannot teleport there.
Try using teleportation to cross the room!
